question_id: Tampilkan lima bahan yang paling sering dipakai di semua resep—urutkan dari yang terbanyak. Sertakan nama bahan dan berapa kali dipakai.
sql_query:
SELECT
  b.nama_bahan,
  SUM(rf.jumlah) AS total_jumlah
FROM BAHAN AS b
JOIN RESEP_BAHAN AS rf
  ON b.id_bahan = rf.id_bahan
GROUP BY
  b.nama_bahan
ORDER BY
  total_jumlah DESC
LIMIT 5
raw_response:
```sql
SELECT
  b.nama_bahan,
  SUM(rf.jumlah) AS total_jumlah
FROM BAHAN AS b
JOIN RESEP_BAHAN AS rf
  ON b.id_bahan = rf.id_bahan
GROUP BY
  b.nama_bahan
ORDER BY
  total_jumlah DESC
LIMIT 5;
```
